name: Banner of the Maid: The Oriental Pirate
description: While on a reconnaissance mission with Lannes, Pauline accidentally boarded a British warship. Just as they are about to be found by enemies on board, a strange figure appeared in the cabin.... Mu Zhiyun, the oriental pirate who serves under Ching Shih, sailed across the oceans to Europe with certain purpose.

name: TinyCrack
description: 'Tiny Crack' is a story-based, stage-breaking action game in which you must defeat all enemies within the time limit. Enjoy the action and story of each character and check out different endings.

name: Operation TP
description: A Post-Apocalyptic store run gone wrong, keep moving, don't get hit, get that TP!

name: Shiny Summer
description: Shiny Summer is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Wreckfest: Complete Edition
description: Wreckfest: Complete Edition is an expanded version of the original Wreckfest game developed by Bugbear Entertainment. This edition includes the base game along with Season Pass and Season Pass 2, which were released after the launch. These DLCs add a significant amount of content, including 32 new cars, 20 new roof decorations, and customisation packs

name: Metachromium
description: Metachromium is a spatial app browser that works side-by-side with OpenVR. Run cross-platform spatial apps inside your regular apps! So meta.

name: A Rabbit and the Mystic Fog
description: A Rabbit and the Mystic Fog is a virtual reality adventure in which you go on a search for the inhabitants of the valley, who have disappeared since a mysterious fog appeared in their homeland. Help the little rabbit by completing the story around the charismatic characters of the valley.

name: Anime Wave Simulator
description: Anime Wave Simulator is a nervous FPS where you can defeat Anime girl with a weapon enhancement system. Also a Survival game mode is available and a Pleasure mode with three character and dozen skins for them.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Grail Knight Career
description: The Grail Knight is a new career for Markus Kruber. It contains the new playable career complete with a new talent tree, new weapon types, new abilities, a whole new Bretonnian Knight skin, and more.

name: Memory Card Monsters
description: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Mad Taxi
description: MAD TAXI is a top-view game that will test your reaction and concentration. You are driving a mad taxi driver in a drunken state. Enjoy!

name: Our Past
description: OUR PAST is a story-driven first-person adventure game focused on exploration and puzzle-solving. The player will appear in the role of the main character Patrick trying to find the truth behind his grandfather's death.

name: Bodyless
description: Bodyless is a surreal VR experience based on the director's childhood memory during Taiwan's martial law period in the 1970s. The player becomes a deceased political prisoner's ghost in his journey to find his way home.

developers.name: Virtual and Physical Media Integration Association of Taiwan

name: Hang in! Monkey Bars Robot
description: It's super hard! Physics-unfriendly action! This is an action game in which you move with your hoof.This robot can neither walk nor jump.It just hangs and shifts its weight.Let's swing and fall our way to the goal far beyond!

name: Ready Aim Fire
description: What if you are on an elephant toy battling around in your child-hood toy room? Operate your favorite toy tank mechanically but easily to explore through the cartoon-styled world. Search for the targets, and Ready, Aim, Fire!

name: Rollie
description: Rollie is a side-scrolling, action platformer for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Fallout 76: Season 2 - Armor Ace
description: You’ll join Armor Ace and the Power Patrol in their march of freedom against the dreaded Subjugator and his army of Red Viper minions. Help lead the charge against the oppressive Vipers and fight for Liberty as you rank up over the following 10-weeks. With each rank you achieve, you will unlock new rewards, like themed cosmetics, C.A.M.P. items, in-game currencies, Perk Card Packs, and more.

name: Tomato Way 3
description: Shooter slasher about tomato who want kill his enemy.

name: PUBG Mobile: Season 15
description: Beyond A.C.E.

name: Hope
description: Hope is a Bitsy game about learning to rely on others and fighting against hopelessness, together.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Breakpoint - Red Patriot
description: The third piece of DLC content in the Ghost Recon: Breakpoint season pass

name: eFootball PES 2021 Season Update
description: Celebrate 25 years of PES with the eFootball PES 2021 Season Update! This product is an updated edition of eFootball PES 2020 containing the latest player data and club rosters.

name: BPM: Bullets Per Minute
description: In BPM, all of your actions and the actions of your enemies are tied to the beat of the music. Your enemies perform a dance-like sequence of attacks to an epic rock opera. BPM is inspired by retro shooters of the 90’s. It is fast, frenetic and rhythmical. You can double jump, dash, rocket jump and bunny hop to evade your opponents.

name: Vaporum: Lockdown
description: Vaporum: Lockdown, a prequel to Vaporum, is a grid-based dungeon crawler RPG in an original steampunk setting, inspired by old-school classics of the genre. Follow the story of Lisa Teller, a scientist struggling to survive disastrous events that happened in the tower of Arx Vaporum.

name: Spelunky 2
description: Spelunky 2 builds upon the unique, randomized challenges that made the original a roguelike classic, offering a huge adventure designed to satisfy players old and new. Meet the next generation of explorers as they find themselves on the Moon, searching for treasure and missing family.

name: Artifacts
description: Become Strong And Reclaim What You Lost! Artifacts is a 2D adventure platformer set in an ancient interconnected kingdom littered with powerful relics. Collect synergistic artifacts to challenge the mighty, corrupted foes that lurk beneath the ground.

name: Acephalic
description: This interactive experience is a companion piece to the album "Conspiration" (Conspiracy) by Un Regard Froid. The music and lyrics were inspired by the literary work of Thomas Ligotti. Acephalic further explores the themes of nihilism, cosmic indifference and social construct of productivity through the prism of the anti-Vitruvian man, the acephalic man.

name: Brawl Stars: Welcome To Starr Park!
description: Sin descripción

name: Fire Strike
description: Play 5v5 quick action matches for 5-7 minutes, upgrade weapons and equipment, arrange shooters, use tactical grenades and try to survive. Learn all the game maps and they will become your weapon in the world of the game engulfed in protests and critical confrontation of different fractions.

name: Flower Bears
description: Two bears want to plant a colorful garden, but are allergic to the other's flower of choice. Help them avoid some atchoos!

name: Applaydu
description: Digitalize your toys from the Kinder Surprise chocolate by scanning the figurines or QR codes. You can then play with your characters, play minigames and design your own avatar and while doing this your kids can learn the world.

name: Dagon Ball Super: Lost Episode
description:
Dagon Ball Super: Lost Episode is part of a series of Dragon ball Hentai games made by Yamamoto. It is a R+18 Adult Hentai game featuring Dragon Ball Characters in this specific case, focusing on Broly and Cheelai, and their adventures.
Let's just say that, Saiyans love strong women, and Cheelai loves strong saiyans especially one who's constantly with her without his shirt.

name: Tank Wars
description: Tanks are the most popular units in the gaming world, and many won't argue with that. So the appearance of new Tank Wars game will undoubtedly cause a lot of people's joy. The plot of the game is not original - the defense of the headquarters. You can play alone, repulsive attacks endless line of enemy tanks, or two, trying to beat his friend in a tank duel. Before you plunge into battle, develop a strategy. Act deliberately to gain victory. Shoot your cannon into the brick walls, but leave something for cover, sometimes it's good to wait or ambush. The vertical panels on the left and right show information about the number of remaining enemies and lives.

name: Skywatching
description:
There is something among the stars.
Keep looking up.

A very short horror game. Heavily inspired by LOCAL 58 TV.

name: Neko: The Black Cat
description: Pick-your-path adventure mini-zine.

name: A Story of Merchant
description: A Story of Merchant is a 2D side-scrolling, Action-RPG, Set in an The old Town of Ayotha.

name: Rover Mechanic Challenge: ERC Competition
description: 𝗘𝗥𝗖 𝗥𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗶𝗰 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗻𝗴𝗲 is an e-tournament based on the world's only simulator for repairing Mars Rovers. Take part in solving challenging tasks and become the master of leader board.

name: Beatstar
description:
Join all your favorite artists in the next generation of music games.

Follow the rhythm! Tap and Swipe to the instruments, vocals or beats to master your favorite songs and experience them in a whole new way.

name: A Gay Love Story About Gay Love
description: A short story-based SRPG about two men who will eventually come to love each other. Now updated with added dialogue, new characters, different choices to make and multiple endings!

name: Viking Fight
description: Play as a barbarian and battle with your trusty axe against enemies from all over the world as you grow stronger and stronger!

name: Long Time No See
description: Long Time No See is an Interactive Movie FMV game. You and your friend Ma Zhigao decided to participate in a class reunion and use it as a chance to rob the safe of your rich classmate. But against all expectations, the tranquil villa turned into a closed-off crime scene. You need to make a series of choices in order to survive in various situations as well as uncovering the truth.

name: Plague M.D.
description:
Plague M.D. is a medieval medicine simulator.

Become a quack doctor stuck in a backwater village in the 16th century. Your task is to diagnose and cure the patient using the available tools, ingredients, recipes and books. This is a difficult game against time, misdiagnosis and procrastination can lead you to the stake, and every choice has consequences.

name: Scratch Wars
description: Scratch Wars is a Collectible Card Game, which was released in 2016 in the Czech Republic. It has scratchable cards, which are scannable into the application, thus the game is playable offline and online too with the very same cards.

name: The Stranger VR
description: The Stranger is an intense VR combat game which sets in an incredibly detailed exotic world. Explore the rich sci fi universe and survive with your weapons and wrist blade. Welcome to the world of the Stranger!

name: Khemia
description: A direct sequel to Adastra, in which the emperor Amicus and his diplomat Scipio must embark on a diplomatic mission to Khemia.

name: Fantasy of Expedition
description: Fantasy of Expedition is a Roguelike Strategy Adventure Game where players lead their own army on an expedition mandated by the Heavens. Be careful what choices you make on our randomized maps! Recruit, purchase, and gather relics to win battles and solve events. Your destiny awaits!

name: Starblazer
description: Rock. Paper. Starships! Enjoy the thrill and adrenaline rush that comes with controlling an entire fleet in virtual reality.

name: Hidden Protector
description: You wake up in a strange world, and you are lost. Until a voice come to you he tells you that you are dead. He also tells you that have been chosen to be a hidden protector. You cannot go to hell or heaven you are just stuck in this mysterious place. But you have one chance to get out of here.

name: Island of Deception
description:
Stranded on an island while a terrifying storm is coming, Survivors have to repair a ship to leave. However, Saboteurs just want to place obstacles in the way! Use voice chat and play a drama queen to take control of or see through everything in Werewolf-like social game Island of Deception.

Now released as a Free to Play in English with DLC add ons.

name: Marvel 5DX Legacy
description: Iconic Marvel Cinematic Universe characters come to life in stunning Augmented Reality! Collect Marvel Cinematic Universe heroes and villains like Iron Man, Witness Captain America, Captain Marvel, Spider-man, Thanos and more. Improve your heroes’ stats and unlock special characters & moves as you expand your card collection. Now it’s time to enter the real-time online battles and experience never-before-seen action!

name: Shmucker Casino 2: Purple Boog's Revenge
description: Sin descripción

name: 2048 Animation Puzzle Edition
description: 2048 Animation Puzzle Edition is a HTML5 Skill Game.

name: Illegal Race Tuning
description: Go to the street and become the most wanted racer dominating the Underground.

name: Lifespawn
description: Lifespawn Is a 2D Platformer With a Twist: You Place Your Own Checkpoints. Good Luck.

name: World Cricket Championship 3
description: WCC3 is a next-gen sequel to the World’s No. 1 mobile cricket game - World Cricket Championship 2 (WCC2), the most downloaded & awarded game. WCC3 takes the excitement of realism in mobile cricket a notch higher with cutting-edge gameplay features, brand new controls, multiplayer, professional commentary, exciting animations, real-time motion capture of professional cricketers, & advanced AI. The most realistic cricket game on a phone! WCC3 is a game by cricket lovers for cricket lovers!

name: La Ultima Comida
description: Zombies are everywhere and have been determined to make you their LAST FOOD. There are so many that you don't know if the slow steps and moans you hear come from the end of the hall or from the next corner.

name: 2weistein: The Curse of the Red Dragon
description: The Story All was peace and quiet in Asban and the whole land of Trillion – until that day on which the gates remained closed, as if by ghostly hand, and other strange things happened. The mean magician Godron has stolen the book „Mathematica“ from the creator of Trillion, and has cast an evil spell over the city: a ban on mathematics. Godron wants to gain power over the whole land and transform the world according to his will. But there are the brave heroes Bernard and Celestine with their friend 2weistein who want to put a stop to Godron to keep Trillion peaceful and beautiful, and no on is ever to be afraid again! About the 2weistein games The unique and fantastic idea behind the series of 2weistein games is to train maths in a real 3D action adventure. Embedded in the tantalizing story the player has to solve maths quests or puzzles to get ahead in the game. It was developed by game specialists in cooperation with teachers and psychologists and won several prices and awards in Germany and Austria.

name: Darius: Extra Version
description:
While never originally ported to the Sega Genesis, a port of the game by M2 is featured on the Sega Genesis Mini microconsole of September 19th, 2019. Later, an expanded version titled "Darius Extra Version" was released for a Sega Mega Drive/Genesis cart for a special Amazon prime Day release on October 13th, 2020.

Cartridge and packaging was produced by Columbus Circle.

name: Floppy Minecraft
description: It's Minecraft, but with realistic physics. Mobs are floppy and blocks fall realistically instead of floating.

name: Mighty forest
description: Mighty forest - is a third-person adventure in which you have to play a wolf and find your family.

name: Pocket Souls
description: New weapons, armour, items, boss battles, trainer battles and mechanics. Capture creatures from the world of DS3 and use them to vanquish your foes.

name: Tomb Raider: The Kurtis Trent Chronicles - Chapter 1
description:
It is the late 1990s. Former legionnaire Kurtis Trent now operates as a freelance mercenary. His specialism: the supernatural.

Following a series of mysterious deaths after the discovery of a medieval shrine deep beneath a Welsh mine, Kurtis has been hired to find whatever otherworldly force is wreaking havoc, and take care of it. Little does he know that what he is about to stumble upon will lead him down a dangerous path, one of ancient cults and arcane knowledge, that will bring him face-to-face with demons from his own past, and ultimately, into a battle for the very survival of mankind...

name: Alchemistress Vivi
description: Alchemistress Vivi is a code-breaking logic puzzle that should take approximately 20 to 25 minutes to complete. In each level, up to 6 magic items must be arranged in a certain order to cast powerful spells. Every try results in a feedback that helps the player to eventually find the right sequence. But watch out: There's only a limited number of lives available for this.

name: Faeria: Game + All DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Faeria: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pillar of Rust
description: Enter the Pillar of Rust, a third-person “walking simulator” pain, sorrow, anger, and peace manifested in concrete, rust, and bittersweet memories.

name: Akuma: Wrath of the Fallen
description: Slash your way through hell in this demonic 2d action platformer !

name: 2945VR
description: This is an unconventional VR shooting game.In the game, you can use time slots to activate bullet-time to avoid enemy attacks.And use weapons of different styles to destroy the enemy.

name: Logistique
description: Logistique is a modification which brings a different point of view to the events happening during Half Life 2. It's the first part of a single player campaign developped by Elseware Experience featuring custom maps, textures, sounds and musics.

name: Arabian Treasures: Midnight Match
description: This is the rags to riches story told in a match 3 puzzle adventure within an Arabian themed game!

name: Hoovernauts
description: Hoovernauts is a space-themed, 2D action-platformer that supports local multiplayer of up to 4 players. Using game remotes, players can work together to take down hostile space creatures in the campaign mode or fight against each other in the arena mode.

name: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous - Zipline Minigame
description: A Happy Meal exclusive minigame made to promote Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous. The player must dodge obstacles and wild dinosaurs while gliding down a zipline.

name: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous - Gyrosphere Minigame
description: A Happy Meal exclusive minigame made to promote Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous. The player must navigate obstacles and wild dinosaurs in a gyrosphere vehicle and make it to safety.

name: Fear the Flossom
description:
1st Person Shooter Horror Survival 
 
Racing against the clock, can you last 3 minutes against the zombie horde.

name: Tangomon 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: Yet Another Purple Cave
description: Sin descripción

name: Comrade Trump's Re-election
description: This game is for entertainment only. It does not represent any group or individual, nor does it represent or agree with any political views.A game simulating the re-election of Comrade Trump, let's write a hymn of loyalty.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Shadow
description: Sin descripción

name: Mousebusters
description: The player character just wanted to move into their new apartment, but when they end up transformed into a mouse they find themselves having to join the Mousebusters to take out the ghosts haunting every resident of the building.

name: Mana Spark: Complete Edition
description: Mana Spark: Complete Edition comes with everything included in the essential version of the game as well as an amazing additional content – Forgotten Crypts!

name: TerraTech: R&D Labs
description: R&D Labs is a game mode for TerraTech, which allows the player to take on a variety of unique challenges and test out a series of experimental items.

name: Oil Panic
description: Oil Active is a fan-made remake of the Game and Watch game by the same name, developed for the Arduboy.

name: Cactu-sama 2
description: A cute puzzle game about a small cactus that is looking for its kouhai in the desert.

name: To the Moon and Beyond
description: In this single player card based game, you get to manage and build up your own space program. Your goal is to build all 8 mission critical objectives to safely send humans to the Moon and establish a permanent Moon habitat. You do this by determining what research to fund on the space station and what projects you want to fund back on Earth. Conducting research on the space station can reduce the cost of some projects or give you the ability to fund others. Results from the projects you fund determine your budget for the next year and get you closer to building your very own custom Rocket, Space Suit, Lunar Space Station, Moon Habitat, and more. Everything you do affects the outcome of your eight part program. But beware, events can happen that can influence that outcome. Will you be able to complete all of your eight mission objectives in four short years?

name: Who Are You?
description: Surviving is the key point of this game, you need to act as a prisoner and escape from that place in a first-person perspective.

name: Coloring Pixels: Dinosaurs Pack
description: Unlocks the Dinosaur themed book for Coloring Pixels! Includes 20 new Dinosaur pixel art pages to complete from the famous Tyrannosaurus Rex to the lesser-known Ammonite!

name: Sweet Dungeon
description: If you are a man, you can go down 100 floors. Come challenge! There are beautiful demons, nurses and dancers waiting for you. If you pass the test successfully, unexpected things will happen!

name: Landing
description: Conquer gravity and land a rocket on the platform. And over and over again. But conditions will change, and the path is not always clear.

name: Escape from Poalet
description: Escape from Poalet is a point & click 3D graphic adventure game for one player. Help our protagonist to escape from Poalet while discovering all its secrets.

name: Barro Racing
description: Barro Racing is a racing game with a toy car/go-kart style.

name: Bob Mazzolini Racing
description: Game is based on timing. As simple to play as holding the STAGE button until the light is green and releasing to go. You can then try to find the best shift points with a four speed transmission and try to improve your reaction time and try to break a record to get on the leader board.

name: Electronic World Z
description: Electronic World Z is a 2D Challenging Platform game based on the story of a Robot called DGIN TV whose mission is to collect all of the Electronic components required to reinstate the Giant Power Generator device in "Z" Power Station.

name: Children of Belgrade Metro
description: The protagonist, Cyzki, moves to Belgrade, the capital of Serbia, four years after construction was suspended. He wanders into the abandoned Belgrade Metro. However, it is a hangout for people with abilities that have no time to spare.

name: Densha de GO!
description: To celebrate the launch of Densha de GO!! Hashirou Yamanote-sen on consoles in 2020, Square Enix published a free mobile version of the original Densha de GO! on their official website in Japan. When viewing the website on a mobile device, the page automatically launched the 1997 game.

name: Dungeon Walk 3d
description: A small Bitsy3d sketch.

name: Barro 2021
description: Barro 2021 is the next gen for the Barro series, new cars, new race tracks, more fun.

name: ReactorX
description: This is a relaxing game about moving boxes on energy grids in a sci-fi setting, in order to repair the space ship which was hit by a meteor.

name: Xentron Attack
description: Xentron Attack is a multi-directional shooter. The evil alien forces called Xentron have invaded your galaxy and spreading dangerous meteors and missiles in the space. Fight with smart enemies who calculates your movements. Turn your ship precisely and use the borderless space wisely.

name: Rad Rocket
description:
Robots have invented rocket jumping and they need you to test it for them! Use your experimental rocket launcher and make your way up from their secret underground facility all the way up to the surface and beyond! Get ready for over 2500 meters of precision platforming, rocket explosions and smooth jazz. You will experience a whole lot of failing, falling and getting back up again through seven different zones in this punishing precision platformer. 
 
No savescumming, no checkpoints... NO MERCY!

name: Holy Potatoes! Compendium
description:
Welcome to the Holy Potatoes veggieverse! The home of wacky and wonderful spudtacular sim management games available in a box for the first time.

The bundle contains three games - ‘Holy Potatoes! A Weapon Shop?!’, ‘Holy Potatoes! We’re In Space?!’ & ‘Holy Potatoes! What the Hell?!’ - all mashed into one Nintendo Switch chip.

name: Inertial Drift
description: An arcade racer that tears up the rule book with innovative twin-stick controls, completely re-imagined driving mechanics and a huge roster of fiercely individual cars and tracks.

name: Knockout Party
description:
KnockOut party is a physics-based 4 players arena fighting game. With fake death feature that allows you to overcome obstacles in a non-standard way and take a shortcut. Knockout your opponent via weapons, game objects or even unarmed.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Take part in online battles of up to 4 players. Play with friends or other players from around the world.

PHYSICS-BASED GAMEPLAY
Game characters are controlled by physics. The level contains physical objects that interact with the character and with each other. So kick the barrel and beat your friend.

FAKE DEATH
You can pretend to be dead. It also allows you to overcome obstacles in a non-standard way and take a shortcut.

VARIOUS MAPS
A variety of game levels with thematic surroundings. Fight with friends in different scenery. From ancient Rome to the roofs of skyscrapers.

DIVERSE WEAPONS
Huge amount of different melee and throwing weapons. Started from hammer, baseball bat to Nimbus 3000 8-)

FUN
Due to the fact that the gameplay is built around the physical interaction of objects and characters, unique situations are generated, which are always fun to watch.

name: Neko Arena
description: Join our Neko Girls in an epic Arena fight on their secret cute island in the middle of the ocean.

name: Yan's World
description: Sin descripción

name: Wolf Chapel Revisit
description: A reimagining of the Wolf Chapel map from Hexen.

name: Super Isikoro Mario World
description: A SMW romhack with 116 exits

name: LockDown
description: Get through the day before the lockdown. Use spacial skills and math skills.

name: Here to There
description: A singleplayer puzzle FPS. The player attempts to solve each area, making progress towards the end.

name: Drums
description: Turn your Nintendo Switch into a portable drum set and learn to play anywhere, anytime.

name: Train Sim World 2: LIRR M3 EMU Loco
description: Take the controls of a "Big Apple" railroading classic with the Long Island Rail Road M3 electric-multiple-unit (EMU) for Train Sim World 2!

name: Train Sim World 2: BR Class 20 'Chopper' Loco
description: A veteran in every right, the Class 20 has earned its place among enthusiasts' hearts; and now Type 1 traction comes to life in Train Sim World 2, ready for hard-working duty on the Tees Valley Line!

name: Train Sim World 2: BR Class 31 Loco
description: After having a career spanning decades, and a successful life in preservation, it's time to turn back the clock and experience the iconic BR Class 31 in its heyday in Train Sim World 2!

name: Crazy Lemmings
description: Control entire armies of lemmings and solve puzzles.

name: Lantern Bearer
description: Lantern Bearer is a tough platformer about a small bear that falls into a dark and mysterious well. Choose your own path and claw your way back to the surface.

name: G-Mode Archives 15: Chura-jima Kurashi
description:
Where there is sky and sea, there is a story. Experience the "slow life" of your dreams on a southern island!

It is a game where you can simulate life on the fictional island "Churajima" reminiscent of a remote island in Okinawa.

"I want to be wrapped in the pleasant sound of waves and look at the wide sky on the sandy beach ..."
Such a longing "slow life" is waiting for you.

Interact with village residents and tourists, sea fishing, shamisen, hub extermination, Okinawan cuisine, etc.
You are free to enjoy the activities unique to the southern island and do anything.
You can walk around the island and have various experiences.

Why don't you relax in "Chura Island" with the main character who moved because he was tired of living in the city?

name: Train Sim World 2: DB BR 155 Loco
description: The "Electric Container", as it’s affectionately known to railfans, has stood the test of time and you can take to the rails hauling heavy freight with a nostalgic twist, as the iconic DB BR 155 is now available for Train Sim World 2 for enticing Ruhr-Sieg Nord action!

name: Microodyssey
description: Microodyssey is a narrative-driven 2D platform game, representing a travel into the greater scientific question: what there is at the start and at the end of everything?

name: Hermes: Sibyls' Prophecy
description: Fight to save to the gods as they battle to retain their immortality! Filled with bizarre and fanciful creatures of legend, Hermes: Sibyls' Prophecy is an epic adventure and a perfect escape for the young and the ageless alike.

name: Love on Paper
description: People come and go. Some stay for a while. Everyone has their dreams.

name: Nova Odessa
description: Nova Odessa is an action/adventure game where you play as a novice demon hunter to kill demons and buy stuff for your house.

name: Beat Me If You Can
description: this game is about a really unique 3d platformer , Sure you have to collect some pickups to gain a new life , but this experience is one of it's own , anger , joy , frustration , satisfaction is a huge part of this game

name: Train Sim World 2: Tees Valley Line - Darlington: Saltburn-by-the-Sea Route
description: Experience a bygone era of British Rail in the historic birthplace of railways and the heart of the British Steel industry in Train Sim World 2: Tees Valley Line. Operate your trains over an aging rail network with out-of-date infrastructure on a route deep in transition between old and new.

name: Train Sim World 2: Ruhr-Sieg Nord: Hagen - Finnentrop Route Add-On
description: Deep valleys, tight curves and picturesque vistas are yours to experience in Train Sim World 2: Ruhr-Sieg Nord, bringing one of Germany's oldest railways to life. Reproduced in exquisite detail, every station, signal and milepost feel so real you could almost reach out and touch them.

name: Train Sim World 2: Long Island Rail Road: New York - Hicksville Route Add-On
description: Experience America's busiest commuter railroad and all the bustle and challenges of railroading in New York City in Train Sim World 2: Long Island Rail Road.

name: Hidden Through Time: Legends of Japan
description: This DLC includes 10 new levels ranging from Japanese temples to Sumo tournaments. It also features more than 300 new Japan themed objects and characters that will be available in the level editor upon purchase!

name: Pulut Adventure RPG
description: The current demon king feels tired, so... "The Demon King Contest" is start. This news spread throughout the entire monster world, so as an ordinary slime decided to go on the adventure and becoming a demon king.

name: Notre-Dame de Paris: Journey Back in Time
description: Ubisoft proposes a Virtual Reality visit of Notre-Dame de Paris in real time, based on the XVIIIth century reconstitution from the videogame Assassin’s Creed : Unity.

name: Dark Cards
description: "Dark Cards" is a card game where you battle opponents by building a deck. In this game you are a debt collector, and face a strange race in the universe and start a crazy adventure.

name: The Adventures of Maximus
description: With the events that lead to the death of Maximus's wife, you embark on an adventure to avenge her death. Fight your way to uncover the mastermind who is responsible for the death of Maximu's wife.

name: Neon Cyborg Cat Club
description: A relaxing and peaceful experience set in a post-apocalyptic future where only mechanical cats remain.

name: Caveman Tales
description: Long ago, in a land before time, there was a forest. For as long as you can remember, a tribe of humans lived safely there. Their village was small but the tribe was happy. But then, everything changed! For mother nature is unpredictable sometimes... Will you help Sam and Crystal and their family to find a new place for the entire tribe? In this fun and colorful time-management game you will explore, guide the tribe, build, gather resources, overcome obstacles along the way and enjoy the tale of family, friendship and courage! However, be aware not everyone really has honest intentions. There are people who only strive to power and wealth.

name: Arcade Archives: Gemini Wing
description: Gemini Wing is a shooting game released by Tecmo in 1987. On a secret mission, Gemini Wing, your objective is to control a Gunship and reclaim the world from the insects. Complete the stages by using 8 different types of Gunballs to shoot down enemies.

name: Tell Me Why: Chapter Three - Inheritance
description: The search for their father's identity has thrown the twins' lives into turmoil. Fearing he's lost his sister, Tyler continues the pursuit alone. Meanwhile, Alyson's guilt brings her into conflict with the people she loves most, as the heart-rending Tell Me Why trilogy concludes!

name: Illusion Connect
description:
Heed the call of justice and fight to defend reality!

Illusion Connect is a mobile real-time strategy game that allows you to build your Radiants, and socialize with them in a myriad of social modes! With more than 50 Radiants at your disposal, create your unique lineup to dominate the Nightmares!

name: Voxiom.io
description: The online multiplayer voxel first person shooter in your browser!

name: Moon Raider
description: Moon Raider is a 2D action adventure platformer set in the diverse and dangerous underworld of the moon.

name: The Old House
description: Are you ready to show your skills in logic games? Looking to complete a few seemingly simple yet challenging tasks? Then feel free to launch the game and start playing.

name: The Golem
description: Challenging block-pushing puzzles.

name: Orthodox
description: LeFort Volentaire must repress his undying rage to prevent his next boxing match from turning bloody.

name: Borderlands 3: Psycho Krieg and the Fantastic Fustercluck
description: Ready to say goodbye to sanity, Vault Hunter? Psycho Krieg and the Fantastic Fustercluck, the fourth campaign add-on for Borderlands 3, will send you on a savage and surreal journey into madness.

name: Smashing Spirits: Brazil's First Boxer
description: Fight Spartans at Brazil Island with fiercely boxing combos on this insanely fast-paced fighting-platformer! Play with Aiyra, an indigenous boxer fighting in the middle of a conflict between her own people and foreigners coming from beyond the seas.

name: Tin & Kuna
description: Spin and smash through the colorful, chaotic worlds of Tin & Kuna. Explore levels filled with puzzles and peril.

name: Vacation Simulator: Back to Job
description: The Gig Economy has arrived in the Vacation Simulator! All Bots have gone on vacation and no one is left to Job. Time for the human to enter the “on-demand” workforce to make the perfect vacation for Bots! Time to job again!

name: Redneck Ed: Astro Monsters Show
description: Redneck Ed: Astro Monsters Show is an energetic, colorful arcade-style beat 'em up that follows the misadventures of Ed, a simple mechanic, in the world of intergalactic show business.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Shadows of New York
description: Vampire: The Masquerade – Shadows of New York is a visual novel set in the rich universe of Vampire: The Masquerade. It's a continuation of our previous title, Coteries of New York. While Coteries was a general introduction to the world depicted in the 5th Edition of the hit tabletop role-playing game, Shadows presents a more personal and unique tale.

name: Hotshot Racing
description: Hotshot Racing is a blisteringly fast arcade-style racing game fusing drift handling, razor-sharp retro visuals and an incredible sense of speed to create an exhilarating driving experience.

name: A Monster's Expedition
description:
A Monster’s Expedition (Through Puzzling Exhibitions) is a brand new adventure tour for monsters who love to learn about humans! Learn the ancient art of pushing trees over* and fashion your own pathways with our easy-build bridges. Then immerse yourself in human culture with all-new exhibits from our "Human Englandland" dig site, each accompanied with expert insights**!

*Trees have been pre-weakened by our experts for your convenience.

**Insights is not a legally binding term and may or may not include idle speculation, rumour and hearsay.

name: As Far as the Eye
description: Embark on an exciting journey in the gorgeous world of A FATE. Build a mobile village and travel with your tribe toward the center of the world, called The Eye. This turn-based resource-management game is made of procedural situations, natural events, skill-trees and hard choices. Ready to move?

name: Why Neon Lights Again?
description: Retro cyberpunk shooter/shooting gallery to play with a friend or on your own. Shoot bad guys and bosses with different weapons, fly on cars, check the story revealed in a comic book style.

name: Bullet Roulette VR
description: Four suspisios persons with mysterious past are sitting around the table in the gloomy dark bar playing Russian Roulette. Beware of other players, because they don't look like someone who plan to play fair. Be tricky and become the last survivor!

name: Tamarin
description: Tamarin features a unique gameplay mix that alternates between 3D-platforming and exploration, and third-person shooter gameplay. The game is inspired by the more open 3D adventures from Nintendo and Rare, and by nature and all the wonderful plants and animals in it.

name: Deleveled
description: Deleveled is a physics-based puzzle-platformer in which you simultaneously control two characters who fall in opposite directions. You must help them work together to get through dozens of tricky levels.

name: Ostranauts
description:
Ostranauts is a detailed simulation of owning and living aboard a spaceship, in a solar system where honest living is a slow death sentence. Set in the NEO Scavenger universe, where Earth has suffered cataclysmic collapse, the rest of the System lives on in a state of capitalistic dystopia.

Players will create their captain, build or customize their starting ship from the spoils of their career history, and find ways to keep fuel in their tanks, food on their plates, and the debt collectors at bay.

name: Reptomom
description: As Reptomom, the fate of dinosauria rests on your cybernetically-enhanced shoulders. Rout the nefarious humans who have taken a quantum-leap to your universe and brainwashed its denizens in a bid to take over. Slash, kick, lase, and blaze your way through 8 areas of classic platforming challenge!

name: Bounty Battle
description: Bounty Battle is the indie fighting game -- a new multiplayer 2D fighting game, where you can square off as your favorite indie hero against other indie heroes from games like Guacamelee!, Darkest Dungeon, Dead Cells, and Psychonauts 2 among other awesome indies. The game features more than 30 character, each with their own companion Minion and unique abilities. It’s Super Smash Bros. meets indie games where you battle across levels inspired from indie game worlds with up to 4 players

name: Quantum Suicide
description:
Quantum Suicide is a game of betrayal, deception and romance in the cold depths of space.

This science fiction thriller visual novel tells the tale of an intergenerational mission and its diverse crew, fighting against a deadly AI (and each other) for the chance to survive. Strategy, love interests and quantum mechanics await you. Your choices change the fate of everyone in Quantum Suicide. You play as a researcher aboard a spaceship on an epic mission to find humanity a new home. The mission is jeopardized by a corrupted A.I system that forces you to play "The Deletion Game", a weekly game where you must battle your crew mates for survival. Prepare to make both friends and enemies of your crew members as you play through rounds of "The Deletion Game".

Can you see the Everett's mission through to the end...alive?

name: Sustenance
description: A 5 map episode that takes you through a city, heading for a portal inside a shrine on the outskirts.

name: Dungeoning
description:
Dungeoning is a fantasy incremental RPG tribute to all things adventuronious.
It combines incremental mechanics with a layer of deep secrets and discovery, so the game plays in your pocket but occupies your mind.
It's a nonstop mobile dungeon crawler that navigates like Snapchat but looks like pixel-art RPGs of olde.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Contest - Summer 2020
description:
Welcome to the Summer 2020 SRB2 Official Level Design Contest! A collection of fan-made levels for Sonic Robo Blast 2! We're back online, better than ever!

The entries are as follows:

Single Player:
- Crystal Cave Zone by CST1229
- Toffee Tor Zone, Act 1 by RoyKirbs
- Hypertower Zone by WasifBoomz
- Shadow of Atlantis Zone by akirahedgehog
- Cluttered Cave Zone, Act 2 by Riolucariolu
- Oasis Palace Zone by So2ro
- Rustic Templar Zone by MK.exe
- Valley Falls Zone by Hamsandwich
- Heroes Hall by Zaxel
- Cyan Heights Zone by PencilVoid
- Wasteland Wilds Zone by SunCyclone
- Concordian Coast Zone by Ktoby & Pronicthewedgehog
- Anteggtica Zone by Radicalicious
- Overgrown Heights Zone by InferNOr
- Snowflake Ridge by TrickyTex & Tatsuru
- Metallic Madness Good Future by Kwiin & Kanna
- Wild West Zone, Act 2 by Dead
- Myriad Memories Zone by ManimiFire
- Aqua Paradise Zone by Twins'R'Awesome
- Magma Falls Zone by RadicalChaos_6922
- Hectic Harbor Zone by ACStriker

Match:
- Spiral Cavern Zone by Su_per
- Crystalline Heights Zone by Revan
- Disco Town Zone by Trege

Circuit:
- HydroWing Zone by JABSphere94
- Haptic Caverns Zone by PencilVoid
- Greenflower Canyon Zone by Kwiin & Frostiikin

Arena:
- Pipeline Panic Zone by RoyKirbs
- Mountainous Saloon Zone by InferNOr
- Gravity Station Zone by Krabs
- Hidden Chamber Zone by Krabs
- Symmetri-Canyon Zone by PapsTheEchidna121
- Arena Station by Latius
- Grassy Clearing by Apollyon

Battle:
- Glimmer Gulch Zone by happyalm
- SSN's Picnic by Zolton
- Peach Castle Zone by ACStriker

Battle CTF:
- Moonlight Zone by Krabs
- Jagged Creek Zone by RoyKirbs
- Serene Shore Zone by Krabs
- Big Arch by Kwiin

name: The 64 kb challenge: Limitless
description: 35 maps made under or equal the file size limitation of 64 kylobites, all these levels are limit-removing ports (complevel 2) compatible, don't play these with vanilla sets or original DOS executable

name: The 64 kb challenge: Vanilla
description: 34 maps made under or equal the file size limitation of 64 kylobites, all these levels are vanilla doom / DOS executable friendly.

name: Gundham's Calamitous Quest for Coochie
description: Gundham Tanaka, the Supreme Overlord of Ice, awakens one morning to embark on a quest. A truly calamitous quest for one of the greatest treasures known to the nine realms - coochie.

name: 2020 Celeste Spring Community Collab
description: A sizeable mod for Celeste that adds a lot of unique content, such as levels and mechanics, to the game.

name: Ask Her Out
description: The Hardest Quest of All: Asking Her Out

name: Hyena Squad
description: Hyena Squad is turn-based, tactical game that combines classic squad tactics with light RPG elements. Set in a deep space station infested with aliens and the animated dead, you will lead an elite team of specialists in a daring rescue mission. Use each of your team mates special skills to their fullest to hold back the alien hordes long enough to achieve your mission objectives and get your squad out alive. The game features intense action where you will have to factor in cover, line of sight, alien positions, and squad morale to make the right decisions for victory. Lead a diverse squad ranging from heavily armored melee specialists, heavy gunners that can unleash a torrent of bullets, elusive and flexible scouts and even mysterious psychics.

name: Rose Seed Replica
description: A feel-good point-and-click lesbian love story about two women unexpectedly cast to the other end of the galaxy.

name: Sunset Shapes
description: Bring broken pieces together, to reveal shapes of everyday objects. Travel with a Daisy and a Maggot along side several scenarios and discover to where they are headed to.

name: SpermDash
description: Learn how to pass on love in Sex-Ed Runner Game Sperm Dash.

name: Randomlands
description: An action-packed shooter where you always need to be on the move. Pick your gun from hundreds of randomly generated options, make your enemies explode, and try to bring down that UFO!

name: World Process
description: The world is roughly a futuristic game in which you play as a "human will" rather than God. The main description of the game is an uncertain fate, macro diversity of the future world.

name: No Game No Life
description: "No Game No Life" is a puzzle game that erases cubes that increase and decrease according to the rules of "Conway's Game of Life".

name: ProjectTeo
description: ProjectTeo is a platformer with moving between dangerous saws and collecting keys.

name: Solitaire: Elemental Wizards
description: Classic Solitaire in a fantasy setting! Help Archmage Gideon regain his former glory!

name: Zball II
description: Zball II is a new physics puzzle game. The goal is the same as in the first Zball game - you need to deliver the green ball to the green platform. It sounds simple, but actually it is not.

name: Cross Princess
description: Single route visual novel. Belle is actually a boy, an accident lets him and a bright girl named Bambi begin to live together, a warm and healing friendship + love story.

name: The Snake King
description: Classic snake return to become of the king. Eat all apple and clear all rooms. With magical power-ups, achieve your glory. Conquer all dungeons and rule them all.

name: Richup.io
description: An online IO game about rolling dice, owning properties, and getting rich.

name: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World: Lost in Memories
description: Sin descripción

name: The Outer Worlds: Peril on Gorgon
description: The Outer Worlds: Peril on Gorgon is the first of two narrative expansions that can be purchased individually or bundled at a discount in The Outer Worlds Expansion Pass. A copy of The Outer Worlds on the same platform is required to play expansion(s).

name: Jack Hayes: The Lazarus Sign
description: A very special challenge: people. Deal with the darkest parts of our modern day society in a story with elements of a film noir. Don't let the humorous dialogue or the seducing smile of a stranger fool you - your choices decide the fate of Jack Hayes, his partner and every other person!

name: Seoul 2033: Shelter
description:
Manage the Shelter in Seoul, devastated since the nuclear explosion.

'SEOUL 2033 : Shelter' takes place in ruined city of Seoul after a nuclear explosion. As the Shelter 1 Administrator, you manage the shelter to survive.

name: Party Hard 2: Collector's Edition
description: Welcome back to the extended Party Hard universe! Choose from hundreds of ways of dealing with noisy partygoers, incidentally destroy a drug syndicate, and save the Earth from an alien invasion. May the chickens be with you!

name: Avicii Invector: Tim Track Pack
description: The Tim Track Pack includes five additional fan-loved tracks from the album TIM.

name: Avicii Invector: Magma Track Pack
description: Keep the Avicii Invector party going, with FIVE new tracks to play, all set in the brand new new Magma world setting.

name: Neon Race
description: Cute retro racer. Go loop and loop in this relaxing animal racing game!

name: Midnight Scenes Ep.2: The Goodbye Note - Special Edition
description: "Taking this plane was a mistake."

name: Olo Loco
description:
OLO Loco is a screw-loose shuffleboard game perfect for the whole family!
Love shuffleboard and chess, but ready to step up your game? The sequel to the award-winning strategy classic OLO is here with an avalanche of incredible new gameplay modes, completely revamped competitive play, and gorgeous minimalist design.
Upgrading the original's stylish chill for a pupil-popping funfair of color and sound, OLO Loco builds on the addictive gameplay and style but adds energy, attitude and a touch of loco.
The new turn-based PvP online mode introduces the OLOMoji family, an eccentric bunch of expressive critters that can be used in-game to express yourself or taunt your opponent!
This finger-flicking minimalist multiplayer extravaganza requires skill and strategy to master, and all-new game modes BOOLO & REVERSO open up a whole new tactical playing field for you, your friends and family to explore.
Use cunning techniques to outmanoeuvre your opponent and claim victory, but beware the death finger!

name: Chess Brain
description: Chess Brain is a chess puzzle game. Draw the correct path and don't let the King get killed by the opposite pieces! Every second all the pieces will move!

name: Stormblades
description: Combat-heavy fantasy RPG with a focus on fast-paced sword-swinging combat

name: Dead by Daylight: Descend Beyond Chapter
description: Descend Beyond is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Blight, and a Survivor, Felix Richter. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the survivor: Felix's The World Class jacket.

name: Star Renegades: Deluxe Edition
description: For those who can’t get enough Star Renegades in their life, we are offering the DELUXE EDITION which includes the game, original OST and 100 full-colour page art book.

name: Living the Nightmare
description: Living the Nightmare is a fast-paced, turn-based, Horror Roguelike about a Slasher who just met his end. Be the Faceless, a Killer slain by a would-be victim and cast into a dark, purgatorial realm. There may be a way out... but there's a lot of monsters to turn inside out first.

name: Arcanion: Tale of Magi
description: Arcanion: Tale of Magi is a retro-style platformer that tells the story of a fledgling warrior Magi, and she and her allies must recover a book from a thief who seeks to use its powers to carry out his revenge.

name: Capital Simulator
description: A game that simulates the use of capital to build a complex industrial chain, stock investment and business challenges

name: Pako Caravan
description: Build you caravan as long as possible! Complete missions in colourful and fun levels that have their own little twists. There is lawn to be mowed, teleports to be used, risky jumps, UFOs, laboratory experiments and many other things waiting!

name: Ednaldo Pereira: Mescladasso
description: Ednaldo Pereira: Mescladasso is a video game based on Ednaldo Pereira's audiovisual experience and all the stories and cultures that are encompassed involving such a person. The game presents an original story in which Ednaldo Pereira and his friend Fleig The Bass Player defend the universe from a robot invasion created by The Dark Elite.

name: Avicii Invector: Encore Edition
description: Re-take the stage for the most complete performance yet! Soar through 35 of AVICII's biggest hits and sweep each fade and attack every beat across SEVEN worlds, in this enthralling rhythm-action experience!

name: The Sims 4: Plus Journey to Batuu Bundle
description: You're in control of creating unique Sims, building their homes, and exploring vibrant worlds - including the remote planet of Batuu.

name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning - Collector’s Edition
description:
The Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning - Collector’s Edition on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC includes the full game which boasts more than 50 hours of gameplay plus the content listed below. 
 
- A highly-detailed Alyn Shir Figurine (20.8cm tall x 18cm wide x 14.2cm deep) 
- A custom Amalur keychain 
- Five pieces of original in-game artwork 
- The award-winning game soundtrack composed by Grant Kirkhope 
- A high-quality Collector’s Box

name: The Sims 4: Journey to Batuu
description: Create your Sim's unique Star Wars story as you explore the remote world of Batuu, from Galaxy's Edge at Disneyland and Disney World, in The Sims 4: Journey to Batuu. Will your Sim join up with the Resistance, fall in with the scoundrels, or enlist with the First Order? It's up to you! Build up your Sim's reputation to unlock missions, purchase a lightsaber or droid, and meet iconic Star Wars characters like Rey and Kylo Ren.

name: Minecraft Dungeons: Creeping Winter
description: A creeping winter is slowly taking over everything it touches, and the source of its chilling power is a powerful creature known as the Wretched Wraith. To stop the never-ending winter in its icy tracks, a noble hero must take on new missions in the lands trapped below zero.

name: Ben 10: Power Trip
description: Ben and his family are enjoying their European vacation... until evil magician Hex unleashes the power of four mysterious crystals! Only Ben 10 can break the curse – so get ready to transform into powerful aliens to battle enemies, solve puzzles and freely explore an exciting 3D world. It’s hero time! With Gwen and Grandpa Max on your side, all the humor and rivalry from the Cartoon Network show is here. And since four arms are better than two, Kevin Levin is along for the adventure in local split-screen co-op. This is one Power Trip you’ll want to take again and again. It’s hero time!

name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning - Collector's Edition
description: The hit RPG returns! From the minds of the bestselling author R.A. Salvatore, Spawn creator Todd McFarlane, and Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion lead designer Ken Rolston comes Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning. Remastered with extended content, stunning visuals, and refined gameplay, KoA delivers intense, customizable RPG combat inside a sprawling game world.

name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning
description: The hit RPG returns! From the minds of the bestselling author R.A. Salvatore, Spawn creator Todd McFarlane, and Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion lead designer Ken Rolston, comes Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning. Remastered with stunning visuals and refined gameplay Re-Reckoning delivers intense, customizable RPG combat inside a sprawling game world.

name: The Rule of Land: Pioneers
description: This is a survival game. After the coronation, human beings had to move into the underground. Fifty years later, some people thought the disaster was over and organized a survival competition on the surface. Some brave people took part in the competition . You are one of them.

name: Meganoid
description: Meganoid is a challenging platformer, generating new levels on every play session. Find many items to enhance your character and his abilities while you descend down into the Meganoid space ship. Do you rush for the exit, or do you take your time to collect everything there is, barely escaping the security drones that will hunt you down if you linger. Key features: - Levels randomly generated on every game session, based on a set of templates, making the levels unique but familiar at the same time. - A platformer with “roguelike” elements. Consumables, alternate routes, procedural generation, and many devices and gadgets add depth to the challenging gameplay of the original Meganoid - A lot of collectible items that will change the main character’s abilities to navigate the world. Find a jetpack to start flying around, find anti-gravity-boots to perform double jumps, and much more. - Hidden bonus area’s to find and unlock. Often providing you with a short-cut or very rare and powerful items. - A hackable game world. Finding green key-cards allows you to modify how certain elements of the game act and respond to you. Stop rocket-launchers from working, make rockets fly less far, make destroyed robots drop extra lives. In true Meganoid tradition, you’ll die a lot in many different ways, but you’ll learn to overcome the difficulties, learn how the Meganoid world operates, and eventually get to the bottom of it!

name: Star Renegades
description: From the makers of Halcyon 6 comes a challenging tactical rogue-lite RPG set in an endless interplanetary rebellion against an evil authoritarian empire. Lead a ragtag squad of rebels in their desperate fight against overwhelming odds and an evolving adversary.

name: Swords 'n Magic and Stuff
description:
Swords ‘n Magic and Stuff is a casual, co-op rpg about, you guessed it, swords, magic and other stuff. Adventure with your friends in a cute but perilous world full of action and adventure. Your role is defined by the items you carry and the way you play.

Full online co-op with up to 8 players means that you can play with all your friends! Get lost in the vast world of Tirawyn and become who you want to be.

name: Cleaner Boy
description:
A platform action game about a boy cleaning his house...with some brute force.

Sweep, clean and combo your way through your house, until every piece of junk is taken care of.

A small game made in 1 week for the GBJam 8.

name: Chroma Slayer
description: Slay chromatically-attuned monsters in front of the city walls.

name: The Lost Frames
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam 62: Colors.

The world used to be more fluid, but some great calamity has forced the world into two frames. It is your job to go to the three worlds and bring back the animation key frame gems, only then will fluid motion be brought back to the world.

name: Starlight Isle
description: This is an MMORPG that you can’t miss in 2020. What are you waiting for? Jump into this fantasy world with your friends now! Captivating Black Desert, dreadful dragons and enchanting elf await! Embark on this fun journey and begin your tale!

name: Monopoly Junior
description: It’s the classic turn-based game transformed into a single player activity-based experience, designed to introduce a new generation of kids to the game. Designed for early learners, this new app transports kids into the animated world of Monopoly Town!

name: AeternoBlade II: Infinity
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Odyssey Safari
description:
Mario's off on a globe-trotting adventure!
Or, he would be if not for some faulty wiring. Explore the mysterious Bonefall Island to find a way to Fossil Falls. From the flowery peaks of Sakura Armory to the forgotten depths of Legend Forest, forge your path through this action packed open-world platformer with familiar gameplay from the hit Super Mario Odyssey.

name: Blue Bayou
description: Embody a crawdad caught in a web of usury. Defend yourself from sinister swamp things as you fight to erase your debts.

name: Pixels Out of Space
description: You are part of a scientific group that is in charge of studying a farm where strange events have happened since months ago. Day by day, the atmosphere becomes more and more strange, and you start losing the sense of time. Suddenly, you woke up in an empty room... But you feel that something that is not from this world is watching you.

name: Decommissioner
description: You are the Decommissioner - tasked with defeating the rogue AI MurderBot by gathering the tools/weapons you need while the MurderBot and it's minions are out to destroy you. Weapons and Equipment are OSP (On Site Procurement), but this is no sneaking mission. If you fail, try again, and the more enemies you defeat, the more equipment will be unlocked to find in the field.

name: An Autumn With You
description: Your parents, your Nana and you have just moved to a remote location out in the country. Help them settle in and explore the wilderness around your Nana's house! It's said that there are spirits in this forest.

name: Chaos of the Periodic Table
description:
This game is an educational RPG that puts chemistry at centre stage of the game mechanics. Collect and gather elements form compounds and molecules and battle your way through a dystopian future.

In this game you will learn some chemistry concepts and develop/deepen your knowledge of the periodic table. Perfect for light-hearted study and/or just hack and slash your way to victory.

name: Crypt o' Casino
description: Mario Party meets Roguelike.

name: H-Sniper: World War II
description: H-Sniper: World War II is a dynamic shooting game based on a sniper mechanics and inspired by World War II theme. You are playing as one of a few soldiers left, shooting the enemies from a hidden spot on the battleground.

name: Sakura Knight 3
description: Estelle's adventures in the land of Lemuria come to a head in this yuri fantasy visual novel. Estelle faces a fierce challenge in the form of the wicked dragonkin Saga, all while deciding which member of her party she wants to pledge her to heart to. It's hard to fight evil and fall in love!

name: Classic Tanks 2020
description: Classic Tanks - a pleasant game in the classic style of retro tanks in a new comprehension. Capture bases, complete levels and destroy enemies. The game has more than 20 missions, several types of enemies and bonuses.

name: Fallout 76 + Wastelanders
description: Sin descripción

name: Another road
description: This is an epic humorous adventure. You play as crazy men in underpants who ride a disgusting cart and try to deliver goods. COOL, YEAH?

name: Mint Works
description: Mint Works is a 20 minute light worker placement game, great for new and experienced players alike. Use your workers to build plans, gain extra abilities and accrue victory points faster than your opponents!

name: Sweet Tooth 2
description: Sweet Tooth 2 is a physical puzzle game with a side view. In the second part, there are more new items to pass, the game has become more difficult!

name: Alice Sisters
description: Help Alice and her sister save their mother through 28 levels spread over 4 worlds, each with their final villain to battle against! Play alone by switching from one character to another, or cooperate with 2 players to complete each level. Go through the levels and solve puzzles !

name: Glitch Escape
description: A Surreal Puzzle-Platformer Adventure Game.

name: Sweet Tooth
description: Sweet Tooth is a physical puzzle with a side view. I bet only 25% of people will pass all the levels and only 1% will collect all 3 candies in each level. So if you are looking for challenging puzzles, then welcome!

name: Wacca Lily
description: The second major update to the arcade rhythm game Wacca, which added song rating and continue features.

name: Crown of the Empire
description: Crown of the Empire: fun adventures await! The queen needs your help!

name: Playing God
description: An interactive narrative, FMV, sci-fi VR experience.

name: Legendary Journeys
description: Create your party of adventurers and set out on a quest to free an old man's magically imprisoned son. Journey the lands of Farmoor in search of the four artifacts needed to reform The Eye of Baal. Not all that live in Farmoor sees this as a good thing.

name: Knight Arena
description: Knight Arena is an action arcade game with a side view. A feature of the game is a developed AI that is presented in 3 versions, easy, medium and difficult, try to win at all levels of difficulty and develop tactics, for each prove that you are the most agile and strong!

name: Survive or Thrive
description: Crikey, mate! You shouldn't be out here all on your own! There's big MONSTAS' runnin' about! And besides... It's not always the beasts that you gotta watch out for. Beasts are easy to predict! They just wanna kill and eat ya! Humans are much harder... They'll pretend to be your friend first!

name: Liquidators
description: Chernobyl, USSR, 1986. Three nuclear plant workers go on a daring mission to prevent a radioactive fallout that would affect half of Europe. Every moment is permanent, and all is at stake.

name: Valentina
description: VALENTINA is a Brazilian indie game. Set in an enchanted kingdom, where Valentina, the player's character, with her bow and arrow faces monsters and surreal beings to save her kingdom and friends. Game features: - 40 hand-crafted levels; - Special unlockable levels for the best explorers; - Take control of Valentina in this classic platform adventure, overcoming enemies with your arrow; - Easy to play, hard to master.

name: Human Diaspora
description: An action packed sci-fi First Person Shooter. Fight for humanity, conquer the colony planet. Use your arsenal to fight enemy infantry and expand your territory. Discover and traverse land, sea and space environments with non-stop battle and perils everywhere.

name: Hacker's Adventure
description: Get ready for a breathtaking platform adventure. Help Super Hacker collect hi-tech products.

name: Super Arcade Soccer 2021
description:
SUPER ARCADE SOCCER 2021 lets you play soccer like never before, combining the best in new technology and classic retro games. It’s the best of both worlds!
Tactics meets intense gameplay in a one-of-a-kind game you’re sure to enjoy.
Face off against IA like you’ve never seen before. Enjoy a wide variety of competitions and an extensive database with the best teams and players in the world.

Play with or against your friends in leagues, cups and friendlies. Even a local 2 vs 2 match!

Pass, dribble, shoot, head, volley... Do whatever it takes to outscore your opponent by the final whistle.

FEATURES

-Real-life teams and players (Clubs and International Teams).
-Leagues, cups and friendly matches.
-Local 2 vs 2 matches.
-Awesome ball physics.
-Configure your lineup.
-Choose from different tactics.
-Real-life sound.
-Player has 7 skills (shooting, passing, aerial ability, strength, control, stamina and speed).
-Endless ways to customize each player (hair, beard, physique, skin tone, etc.).

The game includes 100 clubs, 60 international teams and 1,800 players based on real-life players.

name: Circle Tank
description: Circle Tank is a one-button minimalist coffee-break tank action game. Through three acts, mash uncontrollably as an onslaught of cuboid enemies threaten your existence. Intentionally awkward controls make this a rage-inducing challenge that will put you to the test. Can you survive?
